thread.title: The Slip-On Sneakers of the Future Are Here
thread.title_full: The Slip-On Sneakers of the Future Are Here

title: The Slip-On Sneakers of the Future Are Here
text: The Slip-On Sneakers of the Future Are Already Here X Sneakers The Slip-On Sneakers of the Future Are Already Here When you think of slip-on sneakers, you think the cozy canvas ( often of the checkerboard ) variety, kicks that have been the shoes of choice for surfers, skaters, slackers, and guys in the pages of GQ for decades. But there's a new breed of slip-on challenging those conventional ideas of what a sneaker that takes minimal effort to put on needs to look like. These new laceless styles are sleeker, constructed of the newest technological advancements in fabric, and generally look more suited to a Sci-Fi movie than a boardwalk. But with the right mix of slim sweats (or loose fitting track pants), casual cool knits, and your trusty bomber jacket, these slip-ons of the future are perfectly suited to today's trends. Swipe to see the photos Read More
